message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a special introductory price of $170. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your offer, but $90 is significantly below the value of this product.  To make this work for me, I could come down to $145.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $145, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $115. Can you consider that?
